citations.narrative:
Required information on the acquisition and disposition records of dogs and cats is incomplete. The address, vehicle
license number and driver's license number are missing on the dog and cat acquisition records. Failure to fully disclose
information of the recordkeeping requirements may hinder animal traceback activities required during disease outbreak
investigation or to ensure compliance with the Animal Welfare Act regulations.
Per this Section, every research facility shall make, keep, and maintain records or forms which fully and correctly disclose
the following information concerning each live dog or cat purchased or otherwise acquired, owned, held, or otherwise in
their possession or under their control: the name and address of the person from whom the dog or cat was purchased or
otherwise acquired; the vehicle license number and State, and the driver’s license number and State of the person, if he
or she is not licensed or registered under the Act; the date of acquisition; the official USDA identification number
assigned; and a description of each dog or cat.
Correct by 15 September 2024.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative.
n

narrative:
2.35(b) 
   
Recordkeeping requirements. 
Required information on the acquisition and disposition records of dogs and cats is incomplete. The address, vehicle 
license number and driver's license number are missing on the dog and cat acquisition records. Failure to fully disclose 
information of the recordkeeping requirements may hinder animal traceback activities required during disease outbreak 
investigation or to ensure compliance with the Animal Welfare Act regulations. 
 
Per this Section, every research facility shall make, keep, and maintain records or forms which fully and correctly disclose 
the following information concerning each live dog or cat purchased or otherwise acquired, owned, held, or otherwise in 
their possession or under their control: the name and address of the person from whom the dog or cat was purchased or 
otherwise acquired; the vehicle license number and State, and the driver’s license number and State of the person, if he 
or she is not licensed or registered under the Act; the date of acquisition; the official USDA identification number 
assigned; and a description of each dog or cat.  
 
Correct by 15 September 2024. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative.
